attributes.action: MAKE IT A LAW FOR TEACHERS TO SAY YES FOR KIDS TO GO TO THE TOILET AT LEAST ONCE
attributes.additional_details: I don't think it's fair for students to sometimes return home having urinated their selves due to not being allowed access to the toilet. Also some students are being punished for urinating themselves during lessons when they can't help it. Please solve this issue
attributes.background: There is a problem in secondary schools where in which kids have been denied to going to the toilet during lessons. I think teaches must say yes at least once for a kids to go to the toilet (unless medical intervention is necessary)so they don't have a problem with their bladder in the future.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643422
